choose.when: SELECT a.user_name name , a.user_no user_id, b.team_type, b.team_name FROM top_mbr_bsc a, top_tm_bsc b WHERE a.team_id_main=#{team_id} AND ((a.user_state='1' AND a.out_date >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate})) OR (a.user_state!='1' AND a.join_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}))) AND a.team_id_main = b.team_id ORDER BY a.work_type, a.work_level DESC, a.user_no ASC
choose.otherwise: SELECT a.user_name name , a.user_no user_id, b.team_type, b.team_name FROM top_mbr_bsc a, top_tm_bsc b WHERE a.team_id_main=#{selectVal} AND ((a.user_state='1' AND a.out_date >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate})) OR (a.user_state!='1' AND a.join_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}))) AND a.team_id_main = b.team_id ORDER BY a.work_type, a.work_level DESC, a.user_no ASC

mapper.select:
select ifnull((z.reg_m + y.reg_m + x.reg_m),0) reg_m, ifnull((z.reg_y + y.reg_y + x.reg_y),0) reg_y, ifnull((z.end_m + y.end_m + x.end_m),0) end_m, ifnull((z.end_y + y.end_y + x.end_y),0) end_y, ifnull((z.proc_m + y.proc_m + x.proc_m),0) proc_m, ifnull((z.proc_y + y.proc_y + x.proc_y),0) proc_y, ifnull((z.nend_p + y.nend_p + x.nend_p),0) nend_p, ifnull((z.nend_30r + y.nend_30r + x.nend_30r),0) nend_30r, ifnull((z.ea_sum + y.ea_sum + x.ea_sum),0) ea_sum, ifnull((z.report_ea + y.report_ea + x.report_ea),0) report_ea, ifnull((z.price_assess + y.price_assess + x.price_assess),0) price_assess, ifnull((z.price_time + y.price_time + x.price_time),0) price_time, ifnull((z.p_price_a + y.p_price_a + x.p_price_a),0) p_price_a, ifnull((z.p_price_b + y.p_price_b + x.p_price_b),0) p_price_b, ifnull((z.sum_little + y.sum_little + x.sum_little),0) sum_little, ifnull((z.price_traffic + y.price_traffic + x.price_traffic),0) price_traffic, ifnull((z.price_question + y.price_question + x.price_question),0) price_question, ifnull((z.price_receipt + y.price_receipt + x.price_receipt),0) price_receipt, ifnull((z.sum_hap + y.sum_hap + x.sum_hap),0) sum_hap, ifnull((z.no_settle + y.no_settle + x.no_settle),0) no_settle from
(select ifnull(reg_m,0) reg_m, ifnull(reg_y,0) reg_y, ifnull(end_m,0) end_m, ifnull(end_y,0) end_y , ifnull(round((end_m/reg_m)*100,1),0) proc_m, ifnull(round((end_y/reg_y)*100,1),0) proc_y , ifnull(nend_p,0) nend_p, ifnull(round((nend_30/nend_p)*100),0) nend_30r , ea_sum , ea_sum + ea_pl1 - ea_mi report_ea , ifnull(price_assess,0) price_assess, ifnull(price_time,0) price_time , p_price_pl1_a-p_price_mi_a p_price_a , p_price_pl1_b-p_price_mi_b p_price_b , ifnull(price_assess,0) + ifnull(price_time,0) + (p_price_pl1_a-p_price_mi_a) + (p_price_pl1_b-p_price_mi_b) sum_little , ifnull(price_traffic,0) price_traffic, ifnull(price_question,0) price_question, ifnull(price_receipt,0) price_receipt , ifnull(price_assess,0) + ifnull(price_time,0) + (p_price_pl1_a-p_price_mi_a) + (p_price_pl1_b-p_price_mi_b) + ifnull(price_traffic,0) + ifnull(price_question,0) + ifnull(price_receipt,0) sum_hap , ifnull(no_settle,0) no_settle from (SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) reg_m FROM top_rpt_head where user_no=#{tmpStr} and reg_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and reg_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) ) a ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) reg_y FROM top_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and reg_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromYear}) and reg_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{toYear}) ) b ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) end_m FROM top_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) ) c ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) end_y FROM top_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromYear}) and close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{toYear}) ) d ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) nend_p FROM top_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and suim_rpt_state!='2' and suim_rpt_state!='3') e ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) nend_30 FROM top_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and suim_rpt_state!='2' and suim_rpt_state!='3' and reg_date < unix_timestamp(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())-(#{minusDay}) ) f ,(select ifnull(sum(suim_rpt_ea),0) ea_sum FROM top_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and close_date >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) ) g1 ,(select ifnull(sum(g2x.collabo_pp * 0.01 * g2y.suim_rpt_ea),0) ea_pl1 from top_rpt_collabo g2x, top_rpt_head g2y where g2x.user_id = #{tmpStr} and g2x.suim_rpt_no = g2y.suim_rpt_no and g2y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and g2y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and g2y.suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) ) g2 ,(select ifnull(sum(g5y.collabo_pp * 0.01 * g5x.suim_rpt_ea),0) ea_mi from top_rpt_head g5x, top_rpt_collabo g5y where g5x.user_no = #{tmpStr} and g5x.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and g5x.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and g5x.suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) and g5x.suim_rpt_no = g5y.suim_rpt_no ) g5 ,(select ifnull(sum(h2.amt_basic),0) price_assess, ifnull(sum(h2.amt_daily),0) price_time, ifnull(sum(h2.amt_traffic),0) price_traffic , ifnull(sum(h2.amt_counsel),0) price_question, ifnull(sum(h2.amt_etc),0) price_receipt from top_rpt_head h1, top_rpt_invoice h2 where h1.user_no = #{tmpStr} and h1.close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and h1.close_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) and h1.suim_rpt_no = h2.suim_rpt_no ) h ,(select sum_id2 + sum_price2 p_price_pl1_a from (select ifnull(sum(j11x.collabo_pp),0) sum_id2 from top_rpt_collabo j11x, top_rpt_head j11y where j11x.user_id = #{tmpStr} and j11x.suim_rpt_no = j11y.suim_rpt_no and j11y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j11y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j11y.suim_rpt_type1 in (3,4) ) j11 ,(select ifnull(sum(j12z.amt_basic * j12x.collabo_pp * 0.01),0) sum_price2 from top_rpt_collabo j12x, top_rpt_head j12y, top_rpt_invoice j12z where j12x.user_id = #{tmpStr} and j12x.suim_rpt_no = j12y.suim_rpt_no and j12y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j12y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j12y.suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) and j12x.suim_rpt_no = j12z.suim_rpt_no ) j12 ) j1 ,(select sum_mi + sum_price_mi p_price_mi_a from (select ifnull(sum(j41x.collabo_pp),0) sum_mi from top_rpt_collabo j41x, top_rpt_head j41y where j41y.user_no = #{tmpStr} and j41y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j41y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j41y.suim_rpt_type1 in (3,4) and j41y.suim_rpt_no = j41x.suim_rpt_no ) j41 ,(select ifnull(sum(j42z.amt_basic * j42x.collabo_pp * 0.01),0) sum_price_mi from top_rpt_collabo j42x, top_rpt_head j42y, top_rpt_invoice j42z where j42y.user_no = #{tmpStr} and j42y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j42y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j42y.suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) and j42y.suim_rpt_no = j42x.suim_rpt_no and j42x.suim_rpt_no = j42z.suim_rpt_no ) j42 ) j4 ,(select ifnull(sum(K1z.amt_daily * K1x.collabo_pp * 0.01),0) p_price_pl1_b from top_rpt_collabo K1x, top_rpt_head K1y, top_rpt_invoice K1z where K1x.user_id = #{tmpStr} and K1x.suim_rpt_no = K1y.suim_rpt_no and K1y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and K1y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and K1y.suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) and K1x.suim_rpt_no = K1z.suim_rpt_no ) k1 ,(select ifnull(sum(K4z.amt_daily * K4x.collabo_pp * 0.01),0) p_price_mi_b from top_rpt_collabo K4x, top_rpt_head K4y, top_rpt_invoice K4z where K4y.user_no = #{tmpStr} and K4y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and K4y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and K4y.suim_rpt_type1 in (1,2,11,12,13,14,15,16,17,18,19) and K4y.suim_rpt_no = K4x.suim_rpt_no and K4x.suim_rpt_no = K4z.suim_rpt_no ) K4 ,(select sum(m2.amt_total) no_settle from top_rpt_head m1, top_rpt_invoice m2 where m1.user_no = #{tmpStr} and m1.close_date > 0 and m1.suim_rpt_no = m2.suim_rpt_no and m2.deposit_date < 1 ) m ,(select sum(suim_rpt_ea) endea_m FROM top_rpt_head where user_no = #{tmpStr} and close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and close_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) ) p )z
(select 0 reg_m, 0 reg_y, 0 end_m, 0 end_y , 0 proc_m, 0 proc_y , 0 nend_p, 0 nend_30r , 0 ea_sum, 0 report_ea , 0 price_assess, 0 price_time, 0 p_price_a , 0 p_price_b, 0 sum_little, 0 price_traffic, 0 price_question, 0 price_receipt , 0 sum_hap, 0 no_settle )z
,(select ifnull(reg_m,0) reg_m, ifnull(reg_y,0) reg_y, ifnull(end_m,0) end_m, ifnull(end_y,0) end_y , ifnull(round((end_m/reg_m)*100,1),0) proc_m, ifnull(round((end_y/reg_y)*100,1),0) proc_y , ifnull(nend_p,0) nend_p, ifnull(round((nend_30/nend_p)*100),0) nend_30r , ea_sum , ea_sum + - ea_mi report_ea , ifnull(price_assess,0) price_assess, ifnull(price_time,0) price_time , p_price_pl1_a-p_price_mi_a p_price_a , p_price_pl1_b-p_price_mi_b p_price_b , ifnull(price_assess,0) + ifnull(price_time,0) + (p_price_pl1_a-p_price_mi_a) + (p_price_pl1_b-p_price_mi_b) sum_little , ifnull(price_traffic,0) price_traffic, ifnull(price_question,0) price_question, ifnull(price_receipt,0) price_receipt , ifnull(price_assess,0) + ifnull(price_time,0) + (p_price_pl1_a-p_price_mi_a) + (p_price_pl1_b-p_price_mi_b) + ifnull(price_traffic,0) + ifnull(price_question,0) + ifnull(price_receipt,0) sum_hap , ifnull(no_settle,0) no_settle from (SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) reg_m FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head where user_no=#{tmpStr} and reg_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and reg_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) ) a ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) reg_y FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and reg_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromYear}) and reg_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{toYear}) ) b ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) end_m FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) ) c ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) end_y FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromYear}) and close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{toYear}) ) d ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) nend_p FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and suim_rpt_state!='2' and suim_rpt_state!='3') e ,(SELECT COUNT(suim_rpt_no) nend_30 FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head WHERE user_no=#{tmpStr} and suim_rpt_state!='2' and suim_rpt_state!='3' and reg_date < unix_timestamp(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())-(#{minusDay}) ) f ,(select ifnull(sum(g1x.share_ea * 0.01),0) ea_sum from top_prim_biz_inv_share g1x, top_prim_biz_rpt_head g1y where g1x.share_user_no = #{tmpStr} and g1x.suim_rpt_no = g1y.suim_rpt_no and g1y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and g1y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and g1y.suim_rpt_type1 = 5 ) g1 ,(select ifnull(sum(g5y.share_ea * 0.01),0) ea_mi from top_prim_biz_rpt_head g5x, top_prim_biz_inv_share g5y where g5x.user_no = #{tmpStr} and g5x.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and g5x.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and g5x.suim_rpt_type1 = 5 and g5x.suim_rpt_no = g5y.suim_rpt_no and g5x.user_no != g5y.share_user_no ) g5 ,(select ifnull(sum(h2.amt_basic),0) price_assess, ifnull(sum(h2.amt_daily),0) price_time, ifnull(sum(h2.amt_traffic),0) price_traffic , ifnull(sum(h2.amt_counsel),0) price_question, ifnull(sum(h2.amt_etc),0) price_receipt from top_prim_biz_rpt_head h1, top_prim_biz_inv h2 where h1.user_no = #{tmpStr} and h1.close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and h1.close_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) and h1.suim_rpt_no = h2.suim_rpt_no ) h ,(select ifnull(sum(j1x.share_amt_basic * j1x.share_ea * 0.01),0) p_price_pl1_a from top_rpt_collabo j1x, top_prim_biz_rpt_head j1y where j1x.share_user_no = #{tmpStr} and j1x.suim_rpt_no = j1y.suim_rpt_no and j1y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j1y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j1y.suim_rpt_type1 = 5 ) j1 ,(select ifnull(sum(j4y.share_amt_basic * j4y.share_ea * 0.01),0) p_price_mi_a from top_prim_biz_rpt_head j4x, top_rpt_collabo j4y where j4x.user_no = #{tmpStr} and j4x.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j4x.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j4x.suim_rpt_type1 = 5 and j4x.suim_rpt_no = j4y.suim_rpt_no and j4x.user_no != j4y.share_user_no ) j4 ,(select ifnull(sum(k1x.share_amt_daily * k1x.share_ea * 0.01),0) p_price_pl1_b from top_rpt_collabo k1x, top_prim_biz_rpt_head k1y where k1x.share_user_no = #{tmpStr} and k1x.suim_rpt_no = k1y.suim_rpt_no and k1y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and k1y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and k1y.suim_rpt_type1 = 5 ) k1 ,(select ifnull(sum(k4y.share_amt_daily * k4y.share_ea * 0.01),0) p_price_mi_b from top_prim_biz_rpt_head k4x, top_rpt_collabo k4y where k4x.user_no = #{tmpStr} and k4x.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and k4x.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and k4x.suim_rpt_type1 = 5 and k4x.suim_rpt_no = k4y.suim_rpt_no and k4x.user_no != k4y.share_user_no ) k4 ,(select sum(m2.amt_total) no_settle from top_prim_biz_rpt_head m1, top_prim_biz_inv m2 where m1.user_no = #{tmpStr} and m1.close_date > 0 and m1.suim_rpt_no = m2.suim_rpt_no and m2.deposit_date < 1 ) m ,(select sum(suim_rpt_ea) endea_m FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head where user_no = #{tmpStr} and close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and close_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) ) p )y
,(select 0 reg_m, 0 reg_y, 0 end_m, 0 end_y , 0 proc_m, 0 proc_y , 0 nend_p, 0 nend_30r , 0 ea_sum, 0 report_ea , 0 price_assess, 0 price_time, 0 p_price_a , 0 p_price_b, 0 sum_little, 0 price_traffic, 0 price_question, 0 price_receipt , 0 sum_hap, 0 no_settle )y
,(select ifnull(reg_m,0) reg_m, ifnull(reg_y,0) reg_y, ifnull(end_m,0) end_m, ifnull(end_y,0) end_y , ifnull(round((end_m/reg_m)*100,1),0) proc_m, ifnull(round((end_y/reg_y)*100,1),0) proc_y , p_price_mi_a from top_prim_biz_rpt_head j4x, top_rpt_collabo j4y where j4x.user_no = #{tmpStr} and j4x.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and j4x.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and j4x.suim_rpt_type1 != 5 and j4x.suim_rpt_no = j4y.suim_rpt_no and j4x.user_no != j4y.share_user_no ) j4 ,(select ifnull(sum(k1x.share_amt_daily * k1x.share_ea * 0.01),0) p_price_pl1_b from top_rpt_collabo k1x, top_prim_biz_rpt_head k1y where k1x.share_user_no = #{tmpStr} and k1x.suim_rpt_no = k1y.suim_rpt_no and k1y.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and k1y.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and k1y.suim_rpt_type1 != 5 ) k1 ,(select ifnull(sum(k4y.share_amt_daily * k4y.share_ea * 0.01),0) p_price_mi_b from top_prim_biz_rpt_head k4x, top_rpt_collabo k4y where k4x.user_no = #{tmpStr} and k4x.close_date>=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate}) and k4x.close_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}) and k4x.suim_rpt_type1 != 5 and k4x.suim_rpt_no = k4y.suim_rpt_no and k4x.user_no != k4y.share_user_no ) k4 ,(select sum(m2.amt_total) no_settle from top_prim_biz_rpt_head m1, top_prim_biz_inv m2 where m1.user_no = #{tmpStr} and m1.close_date > 0 and m1.suim_rpt_no = m2.suim_rpt_no and m2.deposit_date < 1 ) m ,(select sum(suim_rpt_ea) endea_m FROM top_prim_biz_rpt_head where user_no = #{tmpStr} and close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and close_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) ) p )x
,(select 0 reg_m, 0 reg_y, 0 end_m, 0 end_y , 0 proc_m, 0 proc_y , 0 nend_p, 0 nend_30r , 0 ea_sum, 0 report_ea , 0 price_assess, 0 price_time, 0 p_price_a , 0 p_price_b, 0 sum_little, 0 price_traffic, 0 price_question, 0 price_receipt , 0 sum_hap, 0 no_settle )x

SELECT a.user_name name , a.user_no user_id, b.team_type, b.team_name FROM top_mbr_bsc a, top_tm_bsc b WHERE a.team_id_main=#{selectVal} AND ((a.user_state='1' AND a.out_date >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{fromdate})) OR (a.user_state!='1' AND a.join_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{todate}))) AND a.team_id_main = b.team_id ORDER BY a.work_type, a.work_level DESC, a.user_no ASC
